data.text: Gumazamizir onganiba uan navir averiabar aven nɨghnɨgha ghaze, “God itir puvatɨ.”
God uan Nguibamɨn pɨn ikia nguazimɨn itir gumazamizibar gari,
Gumazamizir kamaghɨn amiba atiatir bar dafam me bativam.
Kɨ kamaghɨn ifonge, Israelian akurvaghamin gumazitam Saionɨn nguibamɨn ikegh azenan izɨ.
